channel.title: Depth Mapping on FalconBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Depth Mapping on FalconBlog

item.title: Day 27
item.description:
📅 June 27, 2025 – Friday

  • 📝 Drafted Meeting Agenda: Prepared a detailed agenda for the weekly project meeting to ensure structured discussions and progress tracking.
  • 👥 Held Project Meeting: Participated in the scheduled weekly team meeting. Discussed development milestones, upcoming deadlines, and stereo setup improvements.
  • 🔍 Refined Stereo Setup: Continued work on the stereo vision system. Generated another round of depth maps and observed inconsistencies that require calibration and tuning.
  • 📈 Evaluation: Depth map accuracy still not optimal — identifying areas where disparity and baseline adjustments are needed.

The meeting helped align the team, and tomorrow’s focus will be on hardware tweaks and deeper debugging of stereo output.

item.title: Day 26
item.description:
📅 June 26, 2025 – Thursday

  • 🧾 Drafted Project Tasks: Structured and documented the tasks for each project member for the upcoming week to ensure clarity and accountability.
  • 🛠️ Worked on Project Modules: Continued working on the assigned modules, focused on stability and testing edge cases.
  • 🤖 Stereo Setup Progress: Successfully set up the stereo camera system and obtained a preliminary depth map output.
  • 🧪 Experimental Analysis: Validated the quality of the generated depth data; began planning improvements to enhance mapping precision.

The stereo mapping pipeline is finally shaping up. Tomorrow’s goal is to fine-tune the accuracy and integrate it with navigation systems.
